front.title: Applicability of Generic YANG Data Model for layer Independent OAM Management

abstract.t: A generic YANG data model for Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) has been defined in [GENYANGOAM], with the intention that technology-specific extensions will be developed to complete the implementation of the model. In this document, we describe the applicability of the generic YANG OAM data model to specific OAM technologies. To be concrete, we also demonstrate the usability and extensibility of the generic YANG OAM model with OAM protocols such as IP Ping, traceroute, and LSP Ping.
